turns.content: Write a brief text for a gitlab issue in markdown tasking the engineering team with testing and documenting how to connect a data source in Sisense

Test and document data source connection in Sisense
---------------------------------------------------

Hello Engineering team,

We would like to request that you test and document the process for connecting a data source in Sisense.

Please include the following information in your documentation:

* The type of data source you are connecting (e.g. MySQL database, CSV file, etc.)
* The steps required to set up the connection
* Any potential issues or error messages that may occur, and how to troubleshoot them
* Any relevant configuration or settings that need to be considered

Thank you for your help in making it easy for our team to connect and work with data sources in Sisense.

Best, [Your Name]
Remove the formalities and just make it about enumerating the task

Test and document data source connection in Sisense
---------------------------------------------------

Please test and document the process for connecting a data source in Sisense, including:

* The type of data source being connected (e.g. MySQL database, CSV file, etc.)
* The steps required to set up the connection
* Any potential issues or error messages that may occur, and how to troubleshoot them
* Any relevant configuration or settings that need to be considered

Thank you.
Format with headers: description, acceptance criteria

Test and document data source connection in Sisense
---------------------------------------------------

### Description

We would like to request that you test and document the process for connecting a data source in Sisense.

### Acceptance Criteria

* The documentation includes the type of data source being connected (e.g. MySQL database, CSV file, etc.)
* The documentation includes the steps required to set up the connection
* The documentation includes any potential issues or error messages that may occur, and how to troubleshoot them
* The documentation includes any relevant configuration or settings that need to be considered

```
## Test and document data source connection in Sisense

### Description

We would like to request that you test and document the process for connecting a data source in Sisense. 

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] The documentation includes the type of data source being connected (e.g. MySQL database, CSV file, etc.)
- [ ] The documentation includes the steps required to set up the connection
- [ ] The documentation includes any potential issues or error messages that may occur, and how to troubleshoot them
- [ ] The documentation includes any relevant configuration or settings that need to be considered
```
Now generate another issue but with a title of "Q1 Sisense Internal KT (Installation, Upgrade and Monitoring)" where "KT" means "knowledge transfer"

```
## Q1 Sisense Internal KT (Installation, Upgrade and Monitoring)

### Description

We would like to request that you create a knowledge transfer session for the Sisense installation, upgrade and monitoring processes. 

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] The session covers the process for installing Sisense
- [ ] The session covers the process for upgrading Sisense
- [ ] The session covers the process for monitoring Sisense 
- [ ] The session includes any relevant best practices or considerations for these processes
```
Format as a passive description of the work to be done rather than using "we would like"

```
## Q1 Sisense Internal KT (Installation, Upgrade and Monitoring)

### Description

A knowledge transfer session is to be created for the Sisense installation, upgrade and monitoring processes. 

### Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] The process for installing Sisense is covered in the session
- [ ] The process for upgrading Sisense is covered in the session
- [ ] The process for monitoring Sisense is covered in the session 
- [ ] Any relevant best practices or considerations for these processes are included in the session
```

Put in this format:

# DESCRIPTION

---

## GOAL

---

## SCOPE

---

## ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA

- [ ] Security Standards
- [ ] Definition of Done Examples

## REVIEW AND VERIFICATION

| --------------------- | ------------------------------- | ---------------- |
| | | |

All issues have to be reviewed and accepted by Pillar leads

---
---

Q1 Sisense Internal KT (Installation, Upgrade and Monitoring)
=============================================================

---

DESCRIPTION
-----------

A knowledge transfer session is to be created for the Sisense installation, upgrade and monitoring processes.

---

GOAL
----

The goal of this knowledge transfer session is to provide team members with the information and skills necessary to properly install, upgrade, and monitor Sisense.

---

SCOPE
-----

This knowledge transfer session will cover the processes for installing, upgrading, and monitoring Sisense. It will also include any relevant best practices or considerations for these processes.

---

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA
-------------------

* The process for installing Sisense is covered in the session
* The process for upgrading Sisense is covered in the session
* The process for monitoring Sisense is covered in the session
* Any relevant best practices or considerations for these processes are included in the session

---

REVIEW AND VERIFICATION
-----------------------

| Name | EMail Address | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  |  |  |

All issues have to be reviewed and accepted by Pillar leads

---

---
Put that in a code block

```
# Q1 Sisense Internal KT (Installation, Upgrade and Monitoring)

---

## DESCRIPTION

A knowledge transfer session is to be created for the Sisense installation, upgrade and monitoring processes. 

---

## GOAL

The goal of this knowledge transfer session is to provide team members with the information and skills necessary to properly install, upgrade, and monitor Sisense.

---

## SCOPE

This knowledge transfer session will cover the processes for installing, upgrading, and monitoring Sisense. It will also include any relevant best practices or considerations for these processes.

---

## ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA

- [ ] The process for installing Sisense is covered in the session
- [ ] The process for upgrading Sisense is covered in the session
- [ ] The process for monitoring Sisense is covered in the session 
- [ ] Any relevant best practices or considerations for these processes are included in the session
```
